# Network

```mermaid
flowchart TB

%%  way1
    100 --- 101
%%  way2
    102 -.-|2| 101
%%  way3
    102 --- 103 --- 105 --- 104
%%  way5
    107 --- |5| 109 --- |5| 110
%%  way4
    106 -.-> 107 -.-> 108 -.-> 104 -.-> 106
%%   way6
    110 --> |6| 111
%%   way 7
    111 -.-> |7| 110
%%   way8
    112 --> |8| 110
%%   way9
    100 x-- 9 --x 113 x-- 9 --x 101
%%  way 10 (junction=roundabout)
    114 -->|10| 101
```
